engine.resources.container

Class AbstractSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.resources.container.AbstractSlot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainerSlot, ExclusiveSlot

    @Persistent
public abstract class AbstractSlot
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of the slot this object represents

      • isFilled

        public abstract boolean isFilled()
        Returns:
        true if this slot is filled, false otherwise

      • getObject

        public abstract SWGObject getObject()

      • insert

        public abstract void insert(SWGObject swgObj)
        Inserts swgObj into this container. If the container is filled, the old object will be removed.
        Parameters:
        swgObj - the object to insert

      • remove

        public abstract void remove(SWGObject swgObj)
        Removes swgObj from this slot.
        Parameters:
        swgObj - the object to remove

      • clear

        public abstract void clear()
        Empties this slot.

      • traverse

        public abstract void traverse(SWGObject viewer,
            boolean topDown,
            boolean recursive,
            Traverser traverser)
        Traverses over this tree from the perspective of viewer.
        Parameters:
        viewer - the object who is looking into this slot. Only relevant if recursive
        topDown - the direction in which to recurse. Only relevant if recursive
        recursive - true if subobjects should be traversed
        traverser - the object to call as the tree is traversed.
